title: Federal Hall National Memorial: Goods & Services
body: Goods & Services         Eastern National Bookstore NPS  Eastern National Bookstore The Bookstore at Federal Hall National Memorial is operated by Eastern National, a cooperating association of the National Park Service. Pick up your commemorative Federal Hall merchandise today! Merchandise includes postcards, reproduction colonial currency, DVDs, children's gifts, an extensive book selection, and the popular Federal Hall T-shirt! The Museum Store is open Monday through Friday from 10:00 AM to 4:00PM. For questions regarding bookstore merchandise, please call (212) 668-3179.   For further information about cooperating associations, click here. For more information about Eastern National, visit their website: http://www.easternnational.org/default.aspx
